name: Bepsi
about: Being the main proprietor of stalls for the incoming vendors to the festival grounds, Bepsi is a titan of the industry. Always keen to support local festivities with their reach of suppliers and vendors.

name: Veggie Love
about: Here to serve all of your vegetarian and vegan needs! Veggie Love will have mutiple stalls across the festival grounds to provide meals and snacks for all attendees.
slogan: Love of all things grown naturally!

name: Tasty Food
about: Tasty Food acts as a generic chain supplier globally to provide all manner of snacks and ease made meals. They are currently in partnership alongside Bepsi to provide for the music festival.

name: La Plonk
about: An alcholic beverage vendor with a startling array of choices from craft beers to your favourite local pint. La Plonk will be situated all across the grounds to provide your pick of poison in a plastic cup.

name: Cat Beans
about: A new family based vendor with a large affection with the felyne companion. Each stall will be operating throughout the day and night to meet the attendees caffeine and other hot beverage needs.
